rukus.text: geudeul-eun hananim-ui yejeungdeul-eul geoyeoghayeoss-eumae hananim-eun tteusgwa gwonneung eulo chungmanhasin geubun-ui eungbeol-eul geu deul-ege naelyeossnola
neohui bulsinjadeul-i geudeulboda uwolhaneunyo animyeon seongseodeul sog-e neohuie-ui eungbeol-i je-oelado doeeossdan mal-inyo
seolo dowa seuseuloga seunglihal su issdago geudeul-i malhaneunyo
geudeul moduneun paebaehayeo dwidol a seoge doelila
geu sigag-eun geudeul-ege yagsogdoen sigag-eulo gajang seulpeugo gotongseuleoun sigag-i doelila
geudeul-i gogae sog-yeo buljiog-eu lo kkeullieo ganeun nal jiog-ui eungbeol-eul masbola haneun solileul deul-eulila
hananim-ui myeonglyeong-eun hanmadiui malloseo nun kkambaghaneun geosgwa gatnila
hananim-eun neohuiwa yusahan mu lideul-eul myeolmangke haessnani ileul gyohun eulo bad-a deul-ineun ja issneunyo
geudeul-i haenghan modeun geos-eun gilog doenani
jag-eun geosdo geuligo keun geosdo modu gilogdoenola
sillo uiloun jadeul-eun gangmul-i heuleuneun cheongug-eseo gigeohage doeni
geugos-eun gwonneung-eulo chungmanhasin junimgyeot-ui yeong-gwangseuleoun gos-ila
